text:
Hello HubSpot developers! I really need your help on this.
Does anyone know where I can find the files for the standard quote templates?
In the default-theme I cloned you only have the basic one, but I cant seem to find "Standard: modern". Anyone know where I should look for these? I am implementing some small changes, and hope I wont have to replicate the entire template to do so :confused: :pray:

Hi Linda! In my experience, this should happen immediately. It may however seem like a delay sometime as catching prevents a fresh reload, depending on what the document is. I might be wrong.

For development, I would look in to <#CLJJXGTC0|local-development> if delay is an issue. Might make some processes easier for you :slightly_smiling_face: Hope this helped!

Hey just doing a little research and wanting your guys feedback. 

What are the pros and cons of developing as website using the drag and drop editor against using the localised boilerplate? 

Which in your option is the better way to create a website?
Hey <@U01SGRJT2MC> weâ€™re actually going to be releasing a customizable version of that template (hopefully) this week
It will also be module-based which opens up lots of valuable new features
